name: Reflect
effect: Screen Move. User and Allies will receive 1 less Damage from Physical Attacks. If the user is Silver Rank or higher, User and Allies instead receive 2 less damage from Physical attacks. At Diamond Rank or higher, 3 less. Lasts 4 Rounds.
description: The user manifests its mental power on the world, creating invisible walls and floors that prevent the passing of objects.
